title: Moon Stone
summaries: The Moon Stone is a Hardmode accessory which has a 2.86*1/35 (2.86%) / 5.63*69/1225 (5.63%) chance to drop from Vampires during the Solar Eclipse event. It grants the same stat bonuses as the Sun Stone, but these bonuses will only activate during the night or during a Solar Eclipse.

• +10% melee speed
  • +10% damage (all types)
  • +2% critical strike chance
  • +1 HP/s health regeneration
  • +4 defense
  • +15% mining speed
  • +0.5 minion knockback

statistics.Tooltip:
